dewana niyojitha sabhawada masa thunak pamana keti kalayakin wisuruwa harina ladi.min anathuruwa rajaya wishesha ana panath panawamin mathiwarana nithi wenas kala athara wishala pirisakage chanda balaya ahosi kara adhirajyayata pakshapathi aya niyojitha sabhawata path kara ganna ladi.thunwana niyojitha sabhawa 1907-1917 dakwa warsha pahak pawathi athara ehi 410k wu mulu niyojithayan gen 310kma adhirajyayata pakshapathi wu radalayan wiya. 1912 sita 1917 dakwa kriyathmaka wu hatharawana niyojitha sabhawe bahutharayada adhirajyayata pakshapathi wima nisa rajayata wiruddhawa adahas daruwo bala rahitha kuda kandayamak bawata pathwa sitiyaha.
me serama karanna wasarak pamana kalayak gathawewi.
